presentationTable.name: More Time Objects
presentationTable.description:
->
This folder contains additional time attributes like Calendar time attributes and Julian period numbers.

presentationColumns.name: Day Of Week
presentationColumns.description: Day of Week is an integer and is a value between 1 and 7

presentationColumns.name: Day Of Month
presentationColumns.description: Day of Month is an integer and a value between 1 and 31.

presentationColumns.name: Day Of Year
presentationColumns.description: Day of Year is an integer and a value between 1 and 366.

presentationColumns.name: Julian Day Num
presentationColumns.description: Stores the Julian Day Number as an integer.

presentationColumns.name: Julian Week Num
presentationColumns.description: Stores the Julian Week Number as an integer.

presentationColumns.name: Julian Month Num
presentationColumns.description: Stores the Julian Month Number as an integer.

presentationColumns.name: Julian Qtr Num
presentationColumns.description: Stores the Julian Quarter Number as an integer.
